attributes.additional_details:
It's despicable that we give so much to fund war crimes and invest so much in wars when we neglect our own.
The Government have let down the British people with little to zero support to those affected by poverty and mental health which has resulted in a number of homeless on the streets of Britain.
Even more appalling that now spikes have been put up across Britain to stop the homeless from seeking shelter.
There needs to be a new initiative to help the homeless and get them back on their feet and offer support to them.
